trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality that represents the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Define a funcionalidade básica que representa os dados de personalização de uma página.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this base class contain the actual implementation for managing, applying, and extracting personalization data.
trans-unit.target: As classes que derivam esta classe base contém a implementação real para gerir, aplicação e extrair dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class makes use of personalization state with a reference to PersonalizationState.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe faz com que a utilização de estado de personalização com uma referência a PersonalizationState.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: If a developer writes a custom PersonalizationState implementation, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> must also be written.
trans-unit.target: Se um programador escreve uma implementação de PersonalizationState personalizada, personalizadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>também têm de ser escritos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances are responsible for creating and consuming PersonalizationState instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>instâncias são responsáveis pela criação e consumir PersonalizationState instâncias.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The object created by this constructor manages the state for Web Parts controls that are managed by the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: O objeto criado por este construtor gere o estado para controlos de peças Web que são geridos pelo especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> that manages Web Parts controls that have personalization data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> que gere os controlos de peças Web que tenham dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The webPartManager parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The webPartManager parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, aplica-se os dados de personalização para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo associado à instância de estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was a parameter in the constructor that created the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo foi um parâmetro no construtor que criou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, aplica-se os dados de personalização para o controlo de peças Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to apply personalization data to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a definição do método utilizado para aplicar dados de personalização a um controlo de peças Web abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is applied.
trans-unit.target: As peças Web controlar nos qual personalização dados são aplicados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization information from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, extrai informações de personalização do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo associado o atual estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of a method used to extract personalization information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a definição de um método utilizado para extrair informações de personalização do abstrata o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> was a parameter in the constructor that was used to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>foi um parâmetro no construtor que utilizou para criar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization data from the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, extrai os dados de personalização do controlo de peças Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to extract personalization data from a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a definição do método utilizado para extrair dados de personalização de um controlo de peças Web abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control from which personalization data is extracted.
trans-unit.target: As peças Web do controlo de personalização de que os dados são extraídos.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o filtro de autorização para o controlo de peças Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control before an instance of it is created.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>cadeia para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar antes da criação de uma instância do mesmo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if there is no personalized value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método deverá devolver `null` se não existir nenhum valor personalizado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controlo de peças Web não implementa qualquer comportamento predefinido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is provided so that a developer can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é fornecida para que um programador pode atribuir um valor de cadeia arbitrária a personalizadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo; Isto pode propriedade ser verificada ao subscrever o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>evento o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo numa página para determinar se o controlo pode ser adicionado à página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control from which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O ID do controlo de peças Web a partir do qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>são obtidos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter string for a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de filtro de autorização para um controlo de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any personalization information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as informações de personalização foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class checks this property to determine whether the personalization state needs to be written back to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe verifica esta propriedade para determinar se o estado de personalização tem de ser escritos de volta para o arquivo de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state instance has changed (is "dirty"); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver alterado qualquer instância de estado de personalização (é "desatualização"); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, gets a value that indicates whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, obtém um valor que indica se qualquer Estado de personalização extraído por uma instância de estado.

trans-unit.source: This property is an abstract definition of a property that can be called to determine whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é uma definição de uma propriedade que pode ser chamada para determinar se qualquer Estado de personalização extraído por uma instância de estado abstracta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state was extracted by a state instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se qualquer Estado de personalização extraído por uma instância de estado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the current personalization state as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Marca o atual estado de personalização como ter alterado.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> can use this method to mark themselves as having changed (or being "dirty"), thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Classes de herdar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>pode utilizar este método para marcar próprios como ter alterado (a ou "desatualização"), assim que indicam a necessidade de reserialize e guardar o estado de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks a Web Parts control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, marca um controlo de peças Web como ter alterado.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract definition of the method used to indicate that a Web Parts control has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma definição abstrata do método utilizado para indicar que um controlo de peças Web foi alterada (é "desatualização").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class exposes methods (which in turn call this method) that can be used by developers to mark a Web Parts control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe expõe métodos (o que por sua vez chamar este método) que podem ser utilizados pelos programadores para marcar um controlo de peças Web como "desatualizados", que indica a necessidade de reserialize e guardar o estado de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked as having changed.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de peças Web ser assinalado como ter alterado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, marca associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo como ter alterado.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance is now considered to have changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Esta é a definição abstrata do método utilizado para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>instância associada a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância agora é considerada foi alterado (é "desatualização").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class exposes a protected method (which in turn calls this method) that can be used by developers to mark the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe expõe um método protegido (o que por sua vez chama este método) o que pode ser utilizado pelos programadores para marcar associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo como "desatualizados", que indica a necessidade de reserialize e guardar o estado de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified Web Parts control is valid.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o controlo de peças Web especificado é válido.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that `webPart` is a valid Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Este método verifica se `webPart` é um controlo de peças Web válido.

trans-unit.source: The base class verifies that `webPart` is not `null` and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: A classe base verifica se `webPart` não é `null` e for gerido pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> should validate Web Parts controls inside of any methods that work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances.
trans-unit.target: As classes que derivem de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>deve validar controlos de peças Web dentro quaisquer métodos que funcionam com <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>instâncias.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that standalone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances do not have state changes accidentally written into the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que autónomo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>instâncias não dispõe de alterações de estado acidentalmente escritas nos dados de personalização de uma página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de peças Web para ser validado.

trans-unit.source: webPart is not currently managed by the associated with the .
trans-unit.target: webPartNão é atualmente gerido pelo associados a .

trans-unit.source: webPart is
trans-unit.target: webPart é

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control currently associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo atualmente associado a instância de estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is the object used as a parameter for the constructor that creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo é o objeto utilizado como um parâmetro para o construtor que cria o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref>.
